title: Create mobile version of customer homepage
description: Ensure that the customer homepage is created mobile first to enable customers to access their accounts from mobile devices.

title: Create start pet visit flow
description: Ensure that the flow is created so that an employee can easily start a pet visit when a customer drops of their pet(s).

title: Create mobile version of employee homepage
description: Ensure that the employee homepage is created mobile first to enable employees to do their job from mobile devices.

title: Create desktop version of login page for customer
description: Ensure that the customer desktop version of homepage allows them to access the primary actions.

title: Create end pet visit flow
description: Ensure that the flow is created so that an employee can easily end a pet visit when a customer picks up their pet(s).

title: Create entity relationship diagram for HVK database
description: Ensure that relationships for HVK database are robust and convey the business rules and requirements
